22001.name: Castle Apocalypse - Outer Gate
22001.description:
A shattered causeway ends at a towering wall of black stone. The main
gate looms in silence. Cold air drifts from the seams between ancient
blocks, and the wall seems to swallow sound.

west.description: A path skirts the wall to the west.

east.description: A path skirts the wall to the east.

up.description: A narrow climb leads back into the Tunnel of Sticks.

extra_descs.gate: The gate is ancient and massive, forged of black iron and inscribed with runes of ending. It radiates cold malice.
extra_descs.wall: The wall rises sheer and seamless, its surface pitted by age and siege. No handholds are visible.
extra_descs.runes: The runes pulse with faint crimson light, spelling doom in a forgotten tongue.

22002.name: Castle Apocalypse - Main Gate
22002.description:
The massive gate is set into the wall here, engraved with apocalyptic
runes. Two armored guardians stand watch in rigid stillness. The stone
beneath your feet is scarred by countless sieges.

extra_descs.guardians: The guardians stand motionless, their armor fused to their flesh. Their eyes burn with hollow fire.
extra_descs.runes: Apocalyptic runes cover the gate, each one a curse made visible.

22003.name: West Wall Path
22003.description:
A narrow path hugs the outer wall, littered with ancient rubble and
shattered bone. The stone underfoot is slick with mold and ash. A chill
wind scrapes along the passage.

22004.name: West Wall Path
22004.description:
The path narrows between crumbling blocks and jutting iron spikes.
Shadows pool in every crevice. The wall looms overhead, blotting out the
sky.

south.description: A dangerous trail winds into a trap‑lined ravine.

22005.name: West Wall Path
22005.description:
Rubble chokes the path here, forcing careful steps. The wall is scarred
by old siege damage. A faint metallic tang hangs in the air. The air is
thick and hard to breathe. The floor is slick with moisture.

22006.name: Northwest Wall Path
22006.description:
The wall curves sharply, its stone cold and slick with condensation.
Darkness gathers in the corners. The silence is oppressive and watchful.
The floor is slick with moisture. The air is thick and hard to breathe.

22007.name: Northwest Wall Path
22007.description:
The wind dies against the massive wall. Shadows pool between fallen
blocks and shattered masonry. The air tastes of dust and decay. The air
is thick and hard to breathe. Darkness clings to every surface.

22008.name: Northwest Wall Dead End
22008.description:
The path ends in a pile of collapsed masonry, the stones charred and
cracked. There is no way forward. The dead end feels deliberate, like a
trap waiting to spring.

22009.name: East Wall Path
22009.description:
A narrow path skirts the outer wall, strewn with broken stone and rusted
metal. The wall rises sheer overhead. Each step echoes in the stillness.
Darkness clings to every surface. The stone walls press close, cold and
damp.

22010.name: East Wall Path
22010.description:
The wall rises sheer here, its surface etched with claw marks deep
enough to fit a fist. Something massive once climbed here. The scratches
are old but still sharp.

22011.name: East Wall Path
22011.description:
The air is colder here, the wall radiating a dead chill that seeps into
bone. Frost rimes the lower stones. The silence is absolute and final.
The silence is oppressive and watchful. Darkness clings to every
surface.

22012.name: Northeast Wall Path
22012.description:
The path turns along the wall, the stone worn smooth by countless feet.
The darkness deepens ahead. A faint wind carries the scent of rot. The
floor is slick with moisture. The stone walls press close, cold and
damp.

22013.name: Northeast Wall Path
22013.description:
Crumbling blocks form a jagged corridor beside the wall. The footing is
treacherous and uneven. The shadows seem to move at the edge of vision.
Darkness clings to every surface. The air is thick and hard to breathe.

22014.name: Northeast Wall Dead End
22014.description:
A sheer wall ends the path, its surface unmarked and impassable. The
dead end feels like a judgment. There is nothing here but dust and
silence.

22020.name: Castle Entry
22020.description:
Beyond the gate lies a shadowed passage of scorched stone. Ash collects
in the corners and dead banners cling to the walls. Each step echoes
through the hollow keep.

22021.name: Castle Passage
22021.description:
A narrow corridor stretches forward, the air thick with soot. Cracks in
the ceiling leak a faint, cold draft. The walls are etched with faded
oaths and broken sigils.

22022.name: Castle Passage
22022.description:
Tattered banners hang like funerary veils. The corridor darkens as the
light dies away. Old blood stains the flagstones in long, dried streaks.
The stone walls press close, cold and damp. The floor is slick with
moisture.

22023.name: Castle Passage
22023.description:
The passage narrows and the chill deepens. Rust flakes from iron
fittings, drifting like black snow. A heavy stillness settles here,
pressing against the skin.

south.description: An ironbound gate blocks the way.

22024.name: Inner Gate
22024.description:
An ironbound gate blocks the way, its surface pitted and scarred. Runes
pulse faintly along the hinges. The air beyond smells of ash and ruin.
The stone walls press close, cold and damp. The silence is oppressive
and watchful.

22025.name: Castle Courtyard
22025.description:
A ruined courtyard opens beneath broken battlements. Charred beams jut
from collapsed arches, and the ground is littered with shattered stone.
A hush hangs over the open space, as if the castle holds its breath.

south.description: A scorched gate blocks the way south.

extra_descs.battlements: The battlements are shattered, their crenellations crumbled to rubble. Nothing watches from above.
extra_descs.beams: Charred beams jut from collapsed arches like broken ribs.
extra_descs.courtyard: The courtyard floor is cracked and littered with debris. Ash drifts in lazy spirals.

22100.name: Blood‑Marked Trail
22100.description:
A narrow trail veers into brutal stonework and jagged spikes. Bones lie
half‑buried in ash, their edges polished smooth. The path coils with a
sense of malice.

22101.name: Winding Deathtrail
22101.description:
The trail twists through shattered pillars and fallen masonry. The air
smells of old blood and rust. A faint rasp echoes from unseen hollows.
The silence is oppressive and watchful. Darkness clings to every
surface.

22102.name: Winding Deathtrail
22102.description:
The path narrows into a cramped passage of spikes and iron. Shadows
cling to the walls, flickering with no light. The floor is slick with
dark residue.

east.description: A narrow gap opens to one side.

22103.name: Bone‑Strewn Turn
22103.description:
The corridor bends through a maze of broken columns. The stone here is
cracked and sharp. A distant metallic scrape repeats like a heartbeat.
Darkness clings to every surface. The air is thick and hard to breathe.

22104.name: Deathtrap Corridor
22104.description:
A long stretch of stone runs beneath jagged arches. Ash sifts from the
ceiling in slow drifts. The air is stale and bitter. The air is thick
and hard to breathe. The stone walls press close, cold and damp.

22105.name: Winding Deathtrail
22105.description:
The trail winds between collapsed walls and serrated iron. Every step
stirs a thin veil of dust. The silence here feels sharpened. The stone
walls press close, cold and damp. Darkness clings to every surface.

east.description: A narrow gap opens to one side.

22106.name: Narrow Switchback
22106.description:
A narrow switchback climbs between splintered beams. The rock is cold to
the touch. A faint wind passes, carrying the smell of smoke. Darkness
clings to every surface. The stone walls press close, cold and damp.

22107.name: Winding Deathtrail
22107.description:
The passage tightens into a spiked corridor. The floor is uneven and
slick. Distant clinks echo like chains in a vault. The stone walls press
close, cold and damp. The air is thick and hard to breathe.

22108.name: Spiked Passage
22108.description:
A jagged stretch of stone opens briefly, then narrows again. The air is
heavy and oppressive. The walls glint with embedded iron. The stone
walls press close, cold and damp. Darkness clings to every surface.

west.description: A narrow gap opens to one side.

22109.name: Winding Deathtrail
22109.description:
A skull‑lined path stretches onward, the bone bleached white. The
silence grows deeper with each step. The floor is scarred by dragging
marks.

22110.name: Skull‑Lined Path
22110.description:
The trail bends through broken supports and shattered lintels. Dust
hangs in the air like mist. A low hum thrums beneath your feet. The
stone walls press close, cold and damp. The air is thick and hard to
breathe.

22111.name: Winding Deathtrail
22111.description:
The corridor tightens, spines of iron jutting from the walls. The air is
cold and metallic. The stone bears fresh gouges. The silence is
oppressive and watchful. The air is thick and hard to breathe.

east.description: A narrow gap opens to one side.

22112.name: Deathtrap Corridor
22112.description:
The path widens into a bleak gallery of cracked stone. The light dulls
to a gray haze. The scent of oil and ash lingers. The stone walls press
close, cold and damp. Darkness clings to every surface.

22113.name: Winding Deathtrail
22113.description:
A narrow stretch leads onward through hooked spikes and rubble. The
silence is heavy and absolute. The floor tilts slightly underfoot. The
silence is oppressive and watchful. The air is thick and hard to
breathe.

west.description: A narrow gap opens to one side.

22114.name: Kirgan's Lair
22114.description:
A throne of broken armor stands in a ruin‑stained chamber. The air is
thick with iron and smoke. This place feels forged for slaughter. The
floor is slick with moisture. The silence is oppressive and watchful.

extra_descs.throne: Kirgan's throne is a pile of shattered armor and broken bones, a monument to slaughter.
extra_descs.armor: Broken armor litters the floor, each piece a fallen champion.

22150.name: Deathtrap
22150.description:
A concealed pit yawns here, lined with spikes and cursed runes. The air
is still and heavy. A faint hum rises from the depths below. The silence
is oppressive and watchful. The floor is slick with moisture.

22151.name: Deathtrap
22151.description:
A concealed pit yawns here, lined with spikes and cursed runes. The air
is still and heavy. A faint hum rises from the depths below. The air is
thick and hard to breathe. Darkness clings to every surface.

22152.name: Deathtrap
22152.description:
A concealed pit yawns here, lined with spikes and cursed runes. The air
is still and heavy. A faint hum rises from the depths below. The air is
thick and hard to breathe. The stone walls press close, cold and damp.

22153.name: Deathtrap
22153.description:
A concealed pit yawns here, lined with spikes and cursed runes. The air
is still and heavy. A faint hum rises from the depths below. The stone
walls press close, cold and damp. The floor is slick with moisture.

22154.name: Deathtrap
22154.description:
A concealed pit yawns here, lined with spikes and cursed runes. The air
is still and heavy. A faint hum rises from the depths below. The stone
walls press close, cold and damp. Darkness clings to every surface.

22026.name: Inner Hall
22026.description:
A scorched hall runs deeper into the keep. The stone is blackened and
slick with soot. The air carries the faint sting of smoke that never
burns out.

south.description: A heavy bone‑iron door stands to the south.

22027.name: Door of the Last Ride
22027.description:
A heavy door of bone and iron stands within a narrow hall. The metal is
cold and rough, the bone polished by countless hands. The silence here
feels deliberate and watchful.

south.description: A chill seeps from the chamber beyond.

22028.name: Chamber of Death
22028.description:
A voidlike chamber swallows light and sound. Frost rims the floor in
thin white lines, and the air bites at the lungs. Everything here feels
final and absolute.

extra_descs.frost: The frost forms intricate patterns, like frozen screams. It does not melt.
extra_descs.void: The darkness here is absolute, swallowing light and hope alike.

22030.name: Hall of War
22030.description:
A corridor lined with broken spears and splintered shields. The stone is
scored by blade marks and gouges. The air thrums with a faint, distant
roar.

22031.name: Hall of War
22031.description:
The hall widens, its walls scarred by old battles. Rusted helms lie
half‑buried in ash. A heat rises here, like embers under the floor. The
floor is slick with moisture. The stone walls press close, cold and
damp.

22032.name: War's Approach
22032.description:
The air grows hot and dry, tasting of iron. Torn banners hang in ragged
strips. A low vibration hums through the stone, like a drumbeat. The air
is thick and hard to breathe. Darkness clings to every surface.

22033.name: War's Arena
22033.description:
A blood‑slick floor surrounds a throne of weapons. The chamber reeks of
steel and sweat. The walls glow with a faint, angry crimson. The stone
walls press close, cold and damp. The silence is oppressive and
watchful.

extra_descs.throne: The throne is built from shattered weapons: swords, axes, spears, all fused in blood and fury.
extra_descs.blood: The blood on the floor is fresh and old at once, as if time itself bleeds here.

22034.name: Hall of Famine
22034.description:
The walls are scraped bare, the stone worn smooth by hunger. Dust falls
in slow, gray sheets. The air is thin and strangely hollow. The floor is
slick with moisture. The silence is oppressive and watchful.

22035.name: Hall of Famine
22035.description:
An empty hall stretches onward, its torches long dead. The silence is
broken only by the scrape of grit underfoot. The floor bears deep,
gnawing gouges.

22036.name: Famine's Approach
22036.description:
Blackened braziers line the passage, all cold. The scent of decay clings
to the air. The corridor feels starved of warmth and light. The air is
thick and hard to breathe. The silence is oppressive and watchful.

22037.name: Famine's Vault
22037.description:
A hollow vault absorbs every sound. The light dulls and fades, as if
consumed. The room feels vast, yet suffocating. The air is thick and
hard to breathe. Darkness clings to every surface.

extra_descs.vault: The vault feels endless, though its walls are visible. Sound dies before it reaches them.
extra_descs.braziers: The braziers are cold and empty, their fuel long since consumed.

22030.name: gate guardian
22030.long_desc: A hulking guardian stands here, its form encased in dark metal.
22030.description: The guardian is a massive figure of shadow and iron, its eyes burning with cold fury. It shows no signs of life beyond the malevolent gleam in its gaze.

22031.name: gate guardian
22031.long_desc: A hulking guardian stands here, its form encased in dark metal.
22031.description: The guardian is a massive figure of shadow and iron, its eyes burning with cold fury. It shows no signs of life beyond the malevolent gleam in its gaze.

22040.name: undead guardian
22040.long_desc: An undead guardian shambles here, its eyes burning cold.
22040.description: This undead horror was once a soldier. Now it is only hunger and hate, bound to patrol these walls for eternity.

22100.name: Kirgan the Destroyer
22100.long_desc: Kirgan stands here, a mountain of muscle and murder.
22100.description: Kirgan the Destroyer is a towering figure of brutal power. His eyes hold nothing but contempt for the living. Scars crisscross his flesh like a map of violence.

22070.name: Pestilence
22070.long_desc: Pestilence drifts here, a miasma of rot and plague.
22070.description: Pestilence is less a being than a presence, a cloud of sickness given form. Where it passes, life withers and hope dies.

22071.name: War
22071.long_desc: War stands here, radiating fury and bloodlust.
22071.description: War is a figure of raw violence, muscles corded with rage. The air around it vibrates with the echoes of a thousand battles.

22072.name: Famine
22072.long_desc: Famine lingers here, a hollow echo of starvation.
22072.description: Famine is gaunt beyond reason, a skeletal presence that seems to drain warmth and sustenance from the air itself.

22073.name: Death
22073.long_desc: Death waits here, silent and inevitable.
22073.description: Death is stillness incarnate. It does not move, yet it is everywhere. Its presence is a weight, a certainty, the end of all things.

22050.name: apocalypse gate key
22050.room_desc: A heavy iron key lies here.

22051.name: inner gate key
22051.room_desc: A dark steel key lies here.

22060.name: ruinblade
22060.room_desc: A massive blade etched with ruin lies here.
22060.description: The ruinblade is a massive weapon of dark iron, its edge never dulling. Runes of destruction crawl along the blade, whispering of fallen kingdoms.

22061.name: apocalypse plate
22061.room_desc: A suit of apocalyptic plate lies here.
22061.description: This plate armor is forged from the ruins of fallen fortresses, each piece bearing the scars of apocalyptic battles.

22070.name: pestilence key
22070.room_desc: A corroded key weeps sickly green mist.

22080.name: plaguewrap
22080.room_desc: A shroud of diseased cloth lies here.

22081.name: pestilent ring
22081.room_desc: A ring oozing faint green vapor rests here.

22082.name: warbrand
22082.description: The warbrand is a brutal cleaver of crimson steel, built for devastation. It hums with the echoes of countless battles.

22083.name: pauldron of war
22083.room_desc: A massive crimson pauldron lies here.

22084.name: hunger chain
22084.room_desc: A chain of empty links lies here.

22085.name: gauntlets of famine
22085.room_desc: Gauntlets of cracked bone lie here.

22086.name: scythe of endings
22086.room_desc: A black scythe rests here, the air around it silent.
22086.description: The scythe of endings is a weapon of absolute finality, its blade black as the void. Where it cuts, nothing heals.

22087.name: veil of the end
22087.room_desc: A veil of night pools here.
22087.description: The veil is woven from shadow and silence, colder than death. It obscures the wearer from both sight and fate.

22088.name: death's ring
22088.room_desc: A ring cold as a grave lies here.
22088.description: This ring is cold to the touch, colder still to the soul. It belonged to Death itself, and carries a fragment of that finality.

22091.name: girdle of hunger
22091.room_desc: A cracked leather girdle lies here.

22092.name: mantle of the end
22092.room_desc: A heavy mantle of void cloth lies here.

22071.name: war key
22071.room_desc: A key stamped with a war sigil lies here.
